snippet.title: Wardens Rising - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | EPIC, Steam, PS5, Xbox S/X
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1055560/Wardens_Rising/

WARDENS RISING is a one of a kind, action-packed game of heroism, strategy, and epic battles. Choose a hero, then team-up or go solo to defend mankind in this thrilling blend of ARPG Shooter and Base Defense. You are the last line of defense against a relentless inter-dimensional enemy threat. Prepare your hero, plan your strategy, build defenses, and fight to protect vital energy cores from massive invasions; not only to save humanity but attain ever-lasting glory. 

Choose from 5 unique heroes and customize them with a variety of tactical gear and defense technology like towers, traps, and walls. Level-up to become more powerful, unlock new technology and character options. Defeat invasions on all 24 campaign maps, take-down epic bosses, and face invasions on 12 endlessly replayable mission-mode maps to become a legendary Warden.
